mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MAX(SCRQ), 'MM'),'YYYY-MM-DD') ybdatefrom, TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(MAX(SCRQ)),'YYYY-MM-DD') ybdateto FROM YL_ZFYB

SELECT sum(a.zfje)detailTotal FROM GR_YLZF_BZMX a LEFT JOIN YL_ZFYB b ON a.bbid = b.bbid and a.hzbz='1' LEFT JOIN DW_XX c ON a.DWID = c.DWID LEFT JOIN GR_XX d ON a.GRID = d.GRID WHERE a.JBR <> 'sys' and a.DWID = #{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DWID,GRID FROM( SELECT a.GRID, a.DWID FROM GR_YLZF_BZMX a LEFT JOIN YL_ZFYB b ON a.bbid = b.bbid and a.hzbz='1' LEFT JOIN DW_XX c ON a.DWID = c.DWID LEFT JOIN GR_XX d ON a.GRID = d.GRID WHERE a.JBR <> 'sys' and a.DWID = #{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM JC_JG WHERE a.GRID=GRID AND MKDM='1') ) GROUP BY GRID,DWID
